definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: To prepare a creamy and smooth cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 搅打后冲调咖啡尽享浓郁的香滑美味。

sentences.english: For smaller volumes simply add 1 scoop to each 50mL of water.
sentences.chinese: 对于较少量的冲调只需添加1勺每50毫升的水。

sentences.english: Top off cereal with fruits or add frozen fruits to smoothies.
sentences.chinese: 用果汁冲调谷类食品，也可将冷冻的水果加入冰沙中。

definition: to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves)/to infuse (tea)
